alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:39PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 615 PM MST... At 539 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Top-Of-The-World, or 8 miles northeast of Superior, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 229 and 249. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 214 and 219. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
